Title: Ninomae Ina'nis
GameText: POWER - Comfy Priestess: Play up to 2 Sanity cards.

- One player may use a power now
- One hero regains 2 HP
- 1 target deals itself 2 fixed psychic damage

Title: Ninomae Ina'nis
GameText: POWER - Artistic Priestess: Draw 2 cards. Play 1 card.

Title: A.O.-chan
GameText:
POWER: Play or discover 1 Ongoing card. 
DRAW PHASE 
You may draw an additional card this phase.
Quote: "A.O-chan is like a Siri or Cortana you can't turn off."

Title: Bonk!
GameText:
Ninomae Ina'nis deals 1 target 3 melee damage. 
You may place this card under a Ritual card.
Quote: "What happens if you squish my squishy hair? I'll bonk you... with a crowbar!"

Title: Chill Drawing
GameText:
Draw 2 cards. 
You may place this card under a Ritual card.
Quote: "Tips for drawing? Just draw. When you're starting off, it's important to learn to enjoy the process a lot!"

Title: Eldritch Knowledge
GameText: POWER: Destroy up to 3 cards under this card. For every card destroyed this way, you may draw 2 cards.
Quote:
"Ina of the mountain, what is your wisdom?"
"There is only... Ina."
Attribution: -- Ninomae Ina'nis, Ina of the Mountain 9

Title: Halo
GameText:
After you use a power on a Ritual card, you may salvage 1 Sanity card. 
END PHASE 
Put up to 1 Sanity card from your hand under 1 Ritual card in play.
Quote: "Hello! I have the super rare onion ring with my head today, chat. Hehe."

Title: INAFF
GameText:
You may destroy 1 Ongoing card. 
You may place this card under a Ritual card.
Quote: "The world will become a punnier place. You can't spell world domination without ina!"

Title: Pet the Tako
GameText:
Discover 1 Takodachi card. 
You may place this card under a Ritual card.
Quote: "Oya oya... Such a cute takodachi made its way over here."

Title: Power of the Ancient Ones
GameText: POWER: Destroy up to 3 cards under this card. For every card destroyed this way, Ninomae Ina'nis deals 1 target 2 irreducible infernal damage.
Quote: "I'm such a blessed tako. I mean, human. Forgetti beam! You now only remember Ina."

Title: Protect the Priestess
GameText:
REACTION: Redirect that damage to a Takodachi card. 
POWER: Destroy up to 3 cards under this card. For every card destroyed this way, play or salvage 1 Takodachi card.
Quote: "Cookie department? We have a code 962, a case of oatmeal raisin. We need to contact the security division to take them out."

Title: Seiso Priestess
GameText: POWER: Destroy up to 3 cards under this card. For every card destroyed this way, 1 Hero target regains 2 HP.
Quote: "We are seiso if we say so!"

Title: Sleep
GameText:
Salvage 1 card.
You may place this card under a Ritual card.

Title: Tako Cultist
GameText:
POWER PHASE
You may use an additional power this phase. If you do, this card deals itself 2 fixed psychic damage.
Quote: "I knew it, as soon as someone said backside, everyone went 'backside?!'. You guys all share the same brain."

Title: Tako
GameText:
When this card is destroyed, choose up to two cards in your trash. Place them under a Ritual card.
START PHASE
Ninomae Ina'nis may regain 1 HP. If she does, this card deals itself 2 fixed psychic damage.
Quote: "Don't worry, everything you guys eat doesn't have any calories. All of it just goes into the void."

Title: Void Tentacles
GameText:
After you use a power on a Ritual card, Ninomae Ina'nis may deal 1 target 3 melee damage.
POWER: You may discard up to 2 cards. For each card discarded this way, Ninomae Ina'nis deals 1 target 2 infernal damage.
Quote: "They're not attached to me. They come from a void portal, like you guys. They're beyond human understanding."

Title: Wah!
GameText:
Draw 1 card. 
Discover 1 Relic card. 
Play 1 card. 
If 3 or more Wah!'s have already been played this turn, Ninomae Ina'nis deals each target 1 fixed psychic damage.
